EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Oct08 UK Time Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Time Builder Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the IntApp Time Builder webinar. Date: Thursday, November 6 Time: 3 pm GMT
Video:
Conference URL: http://e-meetings.mci.com/nc/join.php?i=SV56561&p=intapp&t=c Conference/Meeting Number: SV56561 Conference/Meeting Passcode: intapp
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: 1-630-395-0201 (give operator the passcode: "INTAPP" and conference leader's name: "Jon Roscow")
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 10 minutes prior to the start time.
